abstract: American and Dutch forces are training Senegalese commando squad, which was set up in 2015 to patrol Senegal River, in skills such as marksmanship, beach landings and counterterrorism operations; move is part of country's larger effort to combat threat of terrorist and smuggling networks pushing further into West Africa.
snippet: The exercises come at a time of heightened worries after recent Qaeda attacks at luxury hotels in the capitals of Mali and Burkina Faso....
lead_paragraph: The exercises come at a time of heightened worries after recent Qaeda attacks at luxury hotels in the capitals of Mali and Burkina Faso.

abstract: Donald J Trump argues that United States must wage unrelenting ideological fight to defeat Islamic State during speech at Youngstown State University in Ohio, critical swing state where polls show him trailing Hillary Clinton; renews call to bar anyone from parts of world where terrorism breeds from entering US.
snippet: Mr. Trump, in a foreign policy address, called for “extreme vetting” of prospective new arrivals that would include an “ideological test.”...

snippet: Pope Francis held talks with Iran's president at the Vatican Tuesday, calling on Tehran to play a key role in stopping the spread of terrorism as Iran tries to improve its image in the global arena following an agreement on its nuclear program....

snippet: The brother of an Iraqi refugee who had settled in Texas said he is in shock after learning that his sibling — who had come to the U.S. to escape the violence in their homeland — is now facing charges that he tried to help the Islamic ...
lead_paragraph: The brother of an Iraqi refugee who had settled in Texas said he is in shock after learning that his sibling — who had come to the U.S. to escape the violence in their homeland — is now facing charges that he tried to help the Islamic State group.
